com.jpmorgan.digital.service

Interface StockService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockServiceImpl

    public interface StockService
    StockService is the Service Interface that provide various operations that can be implemented on a stock The following operations can be executed on a Stock Instance:
    • Calculate Dividend Yield
    • Calculate P/E Ration
    • Record Trade
    • Calculate volume weighted stock price based on trades in past 5 minutes
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aman Chhabra
